outcome: /JUDGMENT IN CC 1517/2016 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS -I,NEDUMANGAD UNDER SECTION 143, 147, 148, 149, 294[B]324 OF IPC CRIME NO.647/2016 OF Venjaramoodu Police Station , Thiruvananthapuram P
full_text: El ES 46 Be oH 4 te IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2020/KER/1163 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON THURSDAY, THE 09TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 19TH POUSHA, 1941 Cri .MC.No.9295 OF 2019 (B) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 1517/2016 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS -I,NEDUMANGAD UNDER SECTION 143, 147, 148, 149, 294[B]324 OF IPC CRIME NO.647/2016 OF Venjaramoodu Police Station , Thiruvananthapuram PETITIONERS /ACCUSED : 1 SYAM, AGED 29 YEARS S/O.KRISHNANKUTTY SHYLAJA BHAVAN, THEKKADA VILLAGE TRIVANDRUM 2 ASHIQ AGED 28 YEARS S/O.BADSHAW, A.N.MANZIL, VEMBAYAN VILLAGE, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM . 3 SHAMSEER AGED 25 YEARS S/O.SHAJAHAN, SAFA MANZIL, MANICKKAL VILLAGE, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM 4 RAHUL AGED 24 YEARS RAHUL BHAVAN, MANICKKAL VILLAGE, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM 5 SAJAN AGED 24 YEARS SAJAN MANZIL MANICKKAL VILLAGE, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM BY ADV. SRI.M.R.SARIN PANICKER RESPONDENTS/STATE & DEFACTO COMPLAINANTS : 1 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, KOCHI-682031 2 ASEEM AGED 35 YEARS S/O.ABHUL AZEEZ KUNNUVILA PUTHEN VEEDU PONGUMMOODU, El ES 46 Be [OH 4 ie Crl.MC.No.9295 OF 2019(B) 2020/KER/II63 2 MANIKKAL NEDUMANGAD TALUK, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM R2 BY ADV. RANJITH EN OTHER PRESENT: SRI.C.S.HRITHWIK SR PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 09.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Pisin Crl.MC.No.9295 OF 2019(B) 2020/KER/II63 3 ORDER Dated this the 9th day of January, 2020 The petitioners are accused in C.C No. 1517/2016 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-1, Nedumagad for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 148, 149, 294[b] and 324 read with Section 109 of the IPC. The defacto complainant-injured is the 2"? respondent who has appeared through counsel and filed an affidavit to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled with the petitioners and that he did not not have any grievance against them. A report also has been obtained from the Investigating Officer to that effect. The petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents. There is no public interest involved. In the result, the Crl.M.C is allowed and the entire proceedings in C.C No.1517/2016 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-1, Nedumagad stands quashed under Section 482 Cr.P.C and the accused are discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE NR/09/01/20 lB 46 TE [OH 4 ie Crl.MC.No.9295 OF 2019(B) 2020/KER/II63 4 APPENDIX PETITIONERS' EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE Al COPY OF FIR IN CRIME NO.647/16 OF VENJARAMOODU POLICE STATION ANNEXURE A2 FINAL REPORT IN CC NO.1517/16 PENDING BEFORE THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT -1- NEDUMANGAD ANNEXURE A3 AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT RESPONDENTS ' EXHIBITS: NIL //TRUE CoPYy// PA TO JUDGE
